summary: This is an email chain from March 2011 regarding the management of completed investigative sections from pending cases. The sender requests permission to box and ship these files to the Miami (MM) office due to space constraints, providing a turnaround process for accessing them. The document includes a specific file number (EFTA02730471) and a related case number (31E-MM-108062).

events.title: Deadline for shipping decision
events.description: The email requests a decision by close of business on whether completed investigative sections can be shipped to the Miami office.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email chain dated March 22-23, 2011, concerning the management of completed investigative files.
It references a space constraint prompting a request to ship 'completed sections' of pending investigations to the Miami office.
A specific file number (EFTA02730471) and a related case number (31E-MM-108062) are listed, indicating this is part of a larger case record system.
A process is outlined where 'OS' can retrieve shipped files for requesting agents within a two-day turnaround.
The correspondence shows administrative procedures for handling case materials within the investigative office.
